sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_ui_script"><sys_ui_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><description/><global>false</global><name>angular_ui_script_incident_with_search</name><script><![CDATA[var myApp = angular.module('incidentapp',  []);

myApp.controller('incidentcontroller', [
'$scope',
'$http',
function($scope, $http) {
	
	$scope.incnum = "INC";
	
	$scope.url = 'https://dev14389.service-now.com/api/now/table/incident';
	$http.defaults.headers.common.Accept = "application/json";
	
	
	$scope.updateRecordList = function(incnum) {
		
		$http({
			method: 'GET',
			url: $scope.url + "?sysparm_display_value=true&sysparm_query=numberSTARTSWITH"+incnum+
			"^ORDERBYDESCnumber"+
			"&sysparm_limit=50",
		}).
		success( function(data, status) {
			
			$scope.numbers = data.result;
		}).
		error ( function(data, status) {
			// alert('222 :'+data.result);
			$scope.numbers = [{"number": "Error fetching list"}];
		});
	}
	
	
	
	
	
}
] );]]></script><script_name/><sys_class_name>sys_ui_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>hmurikinati</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2016-06-07 03:01:45</sys_created_on><sys_customer_update>true</sys_customer_update><sys_id>12db75620f331200703447ace1050e5c</sys_id><sys_mod_count>6</sys_mod_count><sys_name>angular_ui_script_incident_with_search</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Global" source="global">global</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_replace_on_upgrade>false</sys_replace_on_upgrade><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_ui_script_12db75620f331200703447ace1050e5c</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>hmurikinati</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2016-06-07 05:53:03</sys_updated_on><use_scoped_format>false</use_scoped_format></sys_ui_script></record_update>

sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_ui_script"><sys_ui_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><description/><global>false</global><name>angular_ui_script_incident_onlytable</name><script><![CDATA[var myApp = angular.module('incidentapp',  []);

myApp.controller('incidentcontroller', [
'$scope',
'$http',
function($scope, $http) {
	
	$scope.incnum = "INC";
	
	$scope.url = 'https://dev14389.service-now.com/api/now/table/incident';
	$http.defaults.headers.common.Accept = "application/json";
	
	
	$scope.updateRecordList = function(incnum) {
		
		$http({
			method: 'GET',
			url: $scope.url + "?sysparm_display_value=true&sysparm_query=numberSTARTSWITH"+incnum+
			"^ORDERBYDESCnumber"+
			"&sysparm_limit=50",
		}).
		success( function(data, status) {
			
			$scope.numbers = data.result;
		}).
		error ( function(data, status) {
			// alert('222 :'+data.result);
			$scope.numbers = [{"number": "Error fetching list"}];
		});
	}
	
	
	
	
	
}
] );]]></script><script_name/><sys_class_name>sys_ui_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>hmurikinati</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2016-06-07 02:50:47</sys_created_on><sys_customer_update>true</sys_customer_update><sys_id>f9597d220f331200703447ace1050e6e</sys_id><sys_mod_count>3</sys_mod_count><sys_name>angular_ui_script_incident_onlytable</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Global" source="global">global</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_replace_on_upgrade>false</sys_replace_on_upgrade><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_ui_script_f9597d220f331200703447ace1050e6e</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>hmurikinati</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2016-06-07 05:53:03</sys_updated_on><use_scoped_format>false</use_scoped_format></sys_ui_script></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sys_ui_script_ed100e620f331200703447ace1050e1a
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_ui_script"><sys_ui_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><description/><global>false</global><name>incidentswith_table_search_sort</name><script><![CDATA[var myApp = angular.module('incidentapp',  []);

myApp.controller('incidentcontroller', [
'$scope',
'$http',
function($scope, $http) {
	
	$scope.incnum = "INC";
	
	$scope.url = 'https://dev14389.service-now.com/api/now/table/incident';
	$http.defaults.headers.common.Accept = "application/json";
	
	
	
	$scope.updateRecordList = function(incnum) {
		
		$http({
			method: 'GET',
			url: $scope.url + "?sysparm_display_value=true&sysparm_query=numberSTARTSWITH"+incnum+
			"^ORDERBYDESCnumber"+
			"&sysparm_limit=50",
		}).
		success( function(data, status) {
			
			$scope.numbers = data.result;
		}).
		error ( function(data, status) {
			// alert('222 :'+data.result);
			$scope.numbers = [{"number": "Error fetching list"}];
		});
	}
	
	$scope.sort = function(keyname){
		$scope.sortKey = keyname;   //set the sortKey to the param passed
		$scope.reverse = !$scope.reverse; //if true make it false and vice versa
		alert('Sort type :'+$scope.reverse)
	}
	
	
	
	
}
] );]]></script><script_name/><sys_class_name>sys_ui_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>hmurikinati</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2016-06-07 03:20:46</sys_created_on><sys_customer_update>true</sys_customer_update><sys_id>ed100e620f331200703447ace1050e1a</sys_id><sys_mod_count>6</sys_mod_count><sys_name>incidentswith_table_search_sort</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Global" source="global">global</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_replace_on_upgrade>false</sys_replace_on_upgrade><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_ui_script_ed100e620f331200703447ace1050e1a</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>hmurikinati</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2016-06-07 05:53:03</sys_updated_on><use_scoped_format>false</use_scoped_format></sys_ui_script></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sys_ui_script_56dd38890f7b1200703447ace1050ee5
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_ui_script"><sys_ui_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><description/><global>false</global><name>angular_ui_script_incident_assigned_to</name><script><![CDATA[var myApp = angular.module('incidentapp',  ['angularUtils.directives.dirPagination']);

myApp.controller('incidentcontroller', [
'$scope',
'$http',
function($scope, $http) {
	 //alert('Inside method');
	$scope.incnum = "INC";
	
	$scope.url = 'https://dev14389.service-now.com/api/now/table/incident';
	$http.defaults.headers.common.Accept = "application/json";
	
	
	$scope.pages = [
		{page : "10"},
		{page : "20"},
		{page : "50"},
		{page : "100"},
		{page : "200"},
    ];
	
	 $scope.selectedcount = $scope.pages[0];
	
	
	
	$scope.sort = function(keyname){
		$scope.sortKey = keyname;   //set the sortKey to the param passed
		$scope.reverse = !$scope.reverse; //if true make it false and vice versa
	}
	
	$scope.updateRecordList = function(incnum) {
		
		$http({
			method: 'GET',
			url: $scope.url + "?sysparm_display_value=true&sysparm_query=numberSTARTSWITH"+incnum+
			"^ORDERBYDESCnumber"+
			"&sysparm_limit=50",
		}).
		success( function(data, status) {
			
			$scope.numbers = data.result;
		}).
		error ( function(data, status) {
			// alert('222 :'+data.result);
			$scope.numbers = [{"number": "Error fetching list"}];
		});
	}
	
	$scope.startEditing = function(num){
		num.editing=true;
		$scope.editedItem = num;
	}
	
	$scope.doneEditing = function(num){
		num.editing=false;
		$scope.editedItem = null;
		
	}
	
	
	
}
